mng: to sting or bite (of mosquito, bee etc), to say repeatedly, to urge insistently, to ask repeatedly, to stick to a point, (onom.) tinkling or jingling sound

exm.mng: to warn repeatedly, to urge, to exhort again and again
to warn, to urge, to exhort, to give instructions carefully and insistently
onomat. ding dong, jingling of bells, clanking sound
